title: How do you counter malphite support?
body:
Just for normal games, whenever somebody plays malphite support they just dominate lane.

hit 6 and its almost GG.

replies.body: you can poke hime down pretty easy, if in draft and its obviously a malphite support, pike a champion that is poke heavy and does mixed damage (ezreal, corki, MF) so he cant capitalize on his w passive. basically poke him down.

and have a janna (since she can interupt his ult and make him useless for the next 2min) or a leona (since she can stunlock the enemy ad, making his cc alot less useful in laning phase engage and towerdives).

Overall malphite isn't really a toptier support champion and he really only works when the enemy groups up tightly or can't react fast enough (or plan ahead) to deal with his ultimate since outside of it, he's pretty useless as a support with no other forms of hard cc and being limited to a below average slow. He doesn't fair well with frequent trading compared to most tank supports like say an alistair, braum, or leona and he can't peel for his adc very well. He's also outclassed as a mage support if he decides to go full ap due to his lack of range, cc outside of his ult, lack of damage and high mana costs. He does excel in all ins and being very hard to kill individually, but when considering the lower levels and budget of a support compared to a toplaner, he is just outclassed by other engage supports like leona, alistair, nautilus and thresh, who can peel better, engage more often and generally trade better on a low gold budget whilst still building tank support items due to higher base damages.
